channel.title: Enable PvP! discussion
channel.description:
I think we should enable PvP on the official server, it would be fun, and serve the following purposes:
[ol][li]Some noob trying to grief your house, kill him.[/li] [li]It would force us to build a defensible house.[/li] [li]It would enable us to play 'war-games' like sieging castles, or just fighting battles. Maybe we could even divide into clans or factions for this purpose.[/li][/ol]
Griefing would still be against the rules, and when we played war games, sieged castles, or raided villages we wouldn't destroy or steal anything, only try to kill each other. Also we wouldn't just randomly kill each other, and you don't have to worry about noobs killing you, because they don't have a sword like you (and don't know how to make that, or armor).
I think it would really make the game a lot more fun, what do you guys think? (I purposefully didn't add a poll so people would have to post their opinions to vote, so don't bother posting with a simple 'no')

item.title: Enable PvP! discussion
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:134, topic:377202”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=473111.msg3463377#msg3463377 date=1294703215]
So people can kill anywhere at anytime?
If so, you won’t be seeing me logging in.
[/quote]

You have to log in! You are a member of my clan and have protection inside the castle! :D[/quote]inb4 role playing on forums

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:135, topic:377202”]MINECRAFT SEEEMS SO COOOOOOOOOOOL I WANNNA PLAY IT :D[/quote]You should

Read full topic

item.title: Enable PvP! discussion
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Having it only underground wouldn’t protect most of our structures… Just let it be an all out war with a few set rules

Read full topic

item.title: Enable PvP! discussion
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=473111.msg3462746#msg3462746 date=1294644980]
I don’t really like the idea above. My reason being you would have to have one specific Y coordinate (height) to be set across the entire map to be ‘sea level’. So basically, anything below that (even if it wasn’t below ground) would be below sea level. Which means that you would be able to attack people above ground as well. The way maps are generated, that method just wouldn’t work.
[/quote]My client displays the coordinates, so maybe mitb could customize a client to show coordinates and you can warn people when they are above the specific pvp level. Then you could require that that client be used, and if people don’t use it, it is their own fault if they die and lose their stuff.[/quote]My point is that there would be no point of having a line where above it/under it you can/can’t attack, because it isn’t distinguished at all. The line would mean nothing.

Read full topic

item.title: Enable PvP! discussion
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I don’t really like the idea above. My reason being you would have to have one specific Y coordinate (height) to be set across the entire map to be ‘sea level’. So basically, anything below that (even if it wasn’t below ground) would be below sea level. Which means that you would be able to attack people above ground as well. The way maps are generated, that method just wouldn’t work.

item.title: Enable PvP! discussion
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=473111.msg3462503#msg3462503 date=1294592067]

Never expected it to derail … guess this community likes to respond a lot.

That’s why we always get offtopic.

How about if you’re 10 blocks below land you can attack other people? Underground could be like a free for all massive pit of mining.
[/quote]That actually makes more sense, but it can’t be 10 blocks down, because of mountains etc. It could be a specific set of coordinates down.[/quote]

That’s what i meant.

10 blocks below sea level, should’ve been more specific.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“justinxg27, post:119, topic:377202”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=473111.msg3462218#msg3462218 date=1294563121]

[quote author=justinxg27 link=topic=473111.msg3462173#msg3462173 date=1294558718]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=473111.msg3462149#msg3462149 date=1294556031]

[quote author=justinxg27 link=topic=473111.msg3462128#msg3462128 date=1294554116]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=473111.msg3462094#msg3462094 date=1294551769]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=473111.msg3462089#msg3462089 date=1294551538]

[quote author=justinxg27 link=topic=473111.msg3462064#msg3462064 date=1294550748]

I never said it didn’t. But ARENA’S didn’t originate from World of Warcraft. They not only are on a lot of MMO’s, but are a REAL thing.
Also, I clearly stated I know nothing about WoW.
[/quote]I’m pretty sure the first MMO to have arena was Ultima Online in 1996 to be honest. Then when WoW came out, it populated and other games got the idea from it
[/quote]Gladiators in ancient Greece invented the idea
[/quote]I thought it was the romans…?
[/quote]I don’t know, but it was those dudes in the coliseums. I hate history.

Or I guess you could date it back to caveman rumble pits…

[/quote]sad
[/quote]Just because you get your ideas from WoW doesn’t mean that we all do
[/quote]Because more than half you guys are still playing that gay rs game

No. We’re playing that gay minecraft game. And we love it.
[/quote]I’m glad some of this community play’s a game which is actually fun and interesting[/quote]
You’re the one who derailed it to WoW.

Read full topic
